name: .DRAWING File Extension
summary: Learn about .DRAWING files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Drawing created by Artboard, a vector illustration program for Mac; saves the drawing in either a binary or plain XML plist (.PLIST) format, depending on the user's save option; usually is contained within an .ARTB package.

content: NOTE: While DRAWING files store the actual drawing created in Artboard, ARTB files are used as the save and load format and contain the DRAWING file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
